history.narrative: Law 14-84, the “Mechanic’s Lien Amendment Act of 2001”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-248, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 6, 2001, and December 4, 2001, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 20, 2001, it was assigned Act No. 14-204 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-84 became effective on March 19, 2002.
